title: Smart Data Models - Noise Pollution
description: Noise Pollution data model merges specific and punctual noise measurements (coming, e.g. from NoiseLevelObservation entities) into average parameters referred to city areas, providing a more city-related data about noise pollution status and evolution.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. it has to be NoisePollution

noiseAnnoyanceIndex.description: Property. Index (1 to 10) according to noise annoyance level

noiseExceedThreshold.description: Property. Percentage of time for which the noise level exceeded a certain threshold (e.g. 65dB for 2h/4h)

noiseOrigin.description: Property. Main origin (source) of the recorded noise at installation of the sensor

buildingsType.description: Property. Type of predominant buildings within the measurement area at installation of the sensor

groundType.description: Property. Type of predominant ground in the measurement area at installation of the sensor

wallsType.description: Property. Facade material types dominant in the measurement area at installation of the sensor

LAmax2.description: Property. Maximum sound level recorded for the last 2 hours

LAeq2.description: Property. Average sound level over the last 2 hours

dateObservedFrom.description: Property. Observation period start date and time

dateObservedTo.description: Property. End date and time of the observation period
